original_text: But after long abstinence Paul stood forth in the midst of them, and said, Sirs, ye should have hearkened unto me, and not have loosed from Crete, and to have gained this harm and loss.
korean_text: 여러 사람이 오래 먹지 못하였으매 바울이 가운데 서서 말하되 여러분이여 내 말을 듣고 그레데에서 떠나지 아니하여 이 타격과 손상을 면하였더라면 좋을 뻔하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Paul stood forth in the midst of them
Sirs, ye should have hearkened unto me
and not have loosed from Crete
and to have gained this harm and loss
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 이런 해와 손실을 겪지 않았어야 했습니다
